question: Julie has had some shiny new clubs and you fancy having a go with one of them. Is this ok? *

choices.text: Of course, as long as you are not in a competition
In a competition you are not allowed to borrow a club from another player to play a shot with it
Yes, you can share clubs for the entire round at any time

explanation: You are not permitted to borrow a club from another player on the course in order to play a stroke with it.
